name: Olukai Ohana Flip - Men's
description: Simple footwear for spending time where the land meets the water.Water-resistant synthetic strap has cushy neoprene padding lined in quick-dry nylon.Soft nylon webbing on the toe-post.Anatomically shape moulded EVA midsole with an Iceva drop-in footbed that adds support.Outsoles are non-marking rubber with siping on the perimeter for grip on wet surfaces.Purchase of this style helps support Olukai's Ohana Giveback Program that aims to preserve Hawaiian culture and traditions.
